page.title: about
page.body:
Hello, Thanks for visiting my website. On this website I am hosting some projects of mine. Please feel free to browse.
My name is Albert. I studied Aerospace Engineering and worked in the aerospace industry for 9 years developing aerodynamic and flight control software for aircraft simulators.
Professionally, I am interested in computer science, fluid dynamics, thermodynamics and mechatronics.
My personal interests are rock climbing, backcountry canoeing, snowshoeing, microbiology and cooking.
